import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
df = pd.read_csv("C:/Users/USER/Project/Kaggle/titanic/titanic_4_ML.csv")

df.head()
Survived Pclass Sex Age Fare Embarked FamilyNum
0 0.0 2 1 22.0 7.2500 2 1
1 1.0 0 0 38.0 71.2833 0 1
2 1.0 2 0 26.0 7.9250 2 0
3 1.0 0 0 35.0 53.1000 2 1
4 0.0 2 1 35.0 8.0500 2 0 
df_train = df[0:891]
train_y = df_train['Survived']
train_X = df_train.drop(['Survived'], axis=1)

df_test = df[891:]
test_X = df_test.drop(['Survived'], axis=1)
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.pipeline import make_pipeline
from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score, cross_val_predict, KFold
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier, ExtraTreesClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, roc_auc_score
cv = KFold(n_splits=10, shuffle=False)

models = [DecisionTreeClassifier(), RandomForestClassifier(), ExtraTreesClassifier()]
accuracy_list, auc_list = [], []

for model in models:
    
    pipe = make_pipeline(StandardScaler(), model)
    
    y_preds = cross_val_predict(model, train_X, train_y, cv=cv, n_jobs=-1)
    
    accuracy = accuracy_score(train_y, y_preds)
    auc = roc_auc_score(train_y, y_preds)
    
    accuracy_list.append(accuracy)
    auc_list.append(auc)
    
pd.DataFrame({"Accuracy": accuracy_list,"AUC": auc_list}, index=models).sort_values(by="Accuracy", ascending=False)
Accuracy AUC
RandomForestClassifier() 0.804714 0.790265
ExtraTreesClassifier() 0.791246 0.778233
DecisionTreeClassifier() 0.774411 0.757957
